mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEETING_COMMENT(MCM_CODE, MCM_DATE, MCM_CONTENT, MT_CODE, GM_CODE) VALUES(SEQ_MEETING_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{commentContent}, #{articleCode}, #{commentWriterCode})
INSERT INTO BOARD_COMMENT(BC_CODE, BC_DATE, BC_CONTENT, BRD_CODE, GM_CODE) VALUES(SEQ_BOARD_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{commentContent}, #{articleCode}, #{commentWriterCode})
INSERT INTO MEETING_RECOMMENT(MRC_CODE, MRC_DATE, MRC_CONTENT, MCM_CODE, GM_CODE) VALUES(SEQ_MEETING_RECOMMENT.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{recommentContent}, #{commentCode}, #{recommentWriterCode})
mapper.select: SELECT MC.MCM_CODE AS COMMENTCODE , MC.MCM_DATE AS MCM_DATE , MC.MCM_CONTENT AS COMMENTCONTENT , GM.GM_CODE AS COMMENTWRITERCODE , GM.GM_NICKNAME AS COMMENTWRITERNAME FROM MEETING_COMMENT MC, GROUP_MEMBER GM WHERE MC.GM_CODE = GM.GM_CODE AND MC.MCM_CODE = #{commentCode}

SELECT BC.BC_CODE AS COMMENTCODE , BC.BC_DATE AS COMMENTDATE , BC.BC_CONTENT AS COMMENTCONTENT , BC.BRD_CODE AS ARTICLECODE , GM.GM_CODE AS COMMENTWRITERCODE , GM.GM_NICKNAME AS COMMENTWRITERNAME FROM BOARD_COMMENT BC LEFT JOIN GROUP_MEMBER GM ON BC.GM_CODE = GM.GM_CODE WHERE BC.BC_CODE = #{commentCode}

SELECT MR.MRC_CODE AS COMMENTCODE , MR.MRC_DATE AS MRC_DATE , MR.MRC_CONTENT AS COMMENTCONTENT , GM.GM_CODE AS COMMENTWRITERCODE , GM.GM_NICKNAME AS COMMENTWRITERNAME FROM MEETING_RECOMMENT MR, GROUP_MEMBER GM WHERE MR.GM_CODE = GM.GM_CODE AND MR.MRC_CODE = #{recommentCode}

SELECT BR.BR_CODE AS COMMENTCODE , BR.BR_DATE AS COMMENTDATE , BR.BR_CONTENT AS COMMENTCONTENT , BR.BC_CODE AS BC_CODE , GM.GM_CODE AS COMMENTWRITERCODE , GM.GM_NICKNAME AS COMMENTWRITERNAME FROM BOARD_RECOMMENT BR LEFT JOIN GROUP_MEMBER GM ON BR.GM_CODE = GM.GM_CODE WHERE BR.BR_CODE = #{recommentCode}
